title: Classic Sci-Fi TV Shows - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/16/17
itunes:title: Classic Sci-Fi TV Shows - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/16/17
description:
Guest host Dave Schrader and famous TV producer Kenny Johnson discuss his work creating such classic science fiction TV shows like the Incredible Hulk, V, the Six Million Dollar Man and the Bionic Woman.
